name: comments
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cheap_youtube_api.
Tool description: 100% Uptime & Reliable | Blazing fast | Fully Featured | 1000x cheaper than Youtube API v3
API description: **Get comments from a video**
example: /comments/dQw4w9WgXcQ

**Parameters**
sort_by: "top", "new" (default: top)

is_id.description: The YouTube video ID to fetch comments for.

sort_by.description: Criteria to sort comments by. Options are "top" or "new". Defaults to "top".
